trans-unit.source: Represents data that is sent with a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Delta" /> event or an <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.Delta" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 表示與 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Delta" /> 事件或 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.Delta" /> 事件一起傳送的資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total amount of change since the manipulation started.
trans-unit.target: 取得自操作開始以來的總變更量。

trans-unit.source: The total amount of change since the manipulation started.
trans-unit.target: 自操作開始以來的總變更量。

trans-unit.source: Gets the amount of change since the last event.
trans-unit.target: 取得自上一個事件以來的變更量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of change since the last event.
trans-unit.target: 自上一個事件以來的變更量。

trans-unit.source: Gets the new x-coordinate of the composite position of the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 取得操作之複合位置的新 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: The new x-coordinate of the composite position of the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 操作之複合位置的新 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: The origin point represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DDeltaEventArgs.OriginX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DDeltaEventArgs.OriginY%2A> properties is the average position of all manipulators associated with an element.
trans-unit.target: 所表示的原始點<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DDeltaEventArgs.OriginX%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DDeltaEventArgs.OriginY%2A>屬性是平均的項目相關聯的所有操作工具位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the new y-coordinate of the composite position of the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 取得操作之複合位置的新 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: The new y-coordinate of the composite position of the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 操作之複合位置的新 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: The origin point represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DDeltaEventArgs.OriginX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DDeltaEventArgs.OriginY%2A> properties is the average position of all manipulators associated with an element.
trans-unit.target: 所表示的原始點<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DDeltaEventArgs.OriginX%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DDeltaEventArgs.OriginY%2A>屬性是平均的項目相關聯的所有操作工具位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current velocities of the manipulation.
The current velocities of the manipulation.
